data.approach: Create a new /git route that clones the /files page but opens directly to the git tab with a split diff view in the main area. The GitPanel sidebar shows file changes, and the main area shows side-by-side diffs for selected files. Will reuse DiffPreviewDrawer internals for the diff display.

summary: Created new /git route to emulate VSCode source control sidebar
Added tab switcher component with Files and Git tab options
Implemented conditional badges for git changes and pending commits

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Side-by-Side Diff View for Git Changes
suggestedTasks.description: Create a new component in the main area that renders side-by-side diffs for modified files when the Git tab is active. The view should dynamically adjust between full-width and constrained drawer modes based on available screen space. Integrate with existing diff rendering logic to maintain consistency.
suggestedTasks.reason: Enhance git change visualization based on initial route implementation
